spin{to{transform:rotate(360deg)}}@keyframes spin{to{transform:rotate(360deg)}}@-webkit-keyframes ping{100%,75%{transform:scale(2);opacity:0}}@keyframes ping{100%,75%{transform:scale(2);opacity:0}}@-webkit-keyframes pulse{50%{opacity:.5}}@keyframes pulse{50%{opacity:.5}}@-webkit-keyframes bounce{0%,100%{transform:translateY(-25%);-webkit-animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(.8,0,1,1);animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(.8,0,1,1)}50%{transform:none;-webkit-animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(0,0,.2,1);animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(0,0,.2,1)}}@keyframes bounce{0%,100%{transform:translateY(-25%);-webkit-animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(.8,0,1,1);animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(.8,0,1,1)}50%{transform:none;-webkit-animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(0,0,.2,1);animation-timing-function:cubic-bezier(0,0,.2,1)}}.primo-content{font-size:1.125rem;--text-opacity:1;color:#374151;color:rgba(55,65,81,var(--text-opacity));margin-bottom:4rem}.primo-content h2{font-weight:600;font-size:2.25rem;--text-opacity:1;color:#252f3f;color:rgba(37,47,63,var(--text-opacity));padding-bottom:1rem}.primo-content h2:after{content:'';display:block;--bg-opacity:1;background-color:#f4f5f7;background-color:rgba(244,245,247,var(--bg-opacity));width:2rem;height:.25rem;margin-top:.5rem;margin-bottom:.5rem}.primo-content h2+p{font-weight:500;font-size:1.25rem}#column-8l8j7{margin-top:4rem}#component-ndrc7 img{border-width:8px}#component-ndrc7 img:last-child{position:absolute;top:-3rem;right:-3rem;z-index:-1}@media
